title: #WorldsLargestLesson: My Stroll With Sir Ken Robinson
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Education - Today 
I have been trying to interview Sir Ken Robinson for the past 3 years, and I wouldn't have been worried if I had to wait a lifetime to event...
